title: F1 US Grand Prix: The 16-year-old living her motorsports dream
description: Chloe Chong started karting on the same track as Lewis Hamilton - now she's at the same F1 race weekend.
content:
When Chloe Chong thinks back to her childhood, her six-year-old self would never have dared to dream she would be where she is now.
This weekend the 16-year-old will be competing at the United State… [+5128 chars]

author: pthompson@insider.com (Polly Thompson)
title: Formula 1 could be coming to Apple as it mulls offering up to $2 billion a year to show races, report says
description: Apple is considering making a bid for the global Formula 1 rights that would be as much as double their current value, Business F1 reported.
content:
Apple is reportedly considering making a bid of up to $2 billion a year for the rights to show Formula 1 races, according to a report by Business F1.
The iPhone maker has "wargamed" the idea and is … [+2443 chars]

title: The marriage of sports and technology can help narrow the gender gap

author: ABC News
title: WATCH: Woman becomes 1st in 5 years to test F1 car
description: Racer Jessica Hawkins became the first woman in five years to test a Formula One car when she got behind the wheel of an Aston Martin.
content: Whats next for Russia? What comes next after Texas school shooting? What's next for abortion rights in America? The new battle for voting right?
